name: Perl: Avoid Subroutines with more then XX Lines of Code
description: Subroutines should not have more than X lines of code. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output: This report lists all Subroutines with more than X lines of code It provides the following information: Subroutine full name, number of lines of code
rationale: Large Subroutines are more difficult to understand, and are a sign of a bad modularity of the code
remediation: Review the design of the Subroutine to reduce its size
